genre_description: A post-apocalyptic biohazard survival story featuring a tactical AI assistant helping a community manage an environmental catastrophe and human corruption.

ai_characters.name: Ariel
ai_characters.description: An AI integrated into the municipal grid, providing real-time data analysis, weather forecasting, and emotional support to human survivors.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental hazards and provides precise timing for 'rain windows' to minimize human exposure to toxins.
behaviors.quote: ‘Logging has started,’ Ariel says, her voice close as breath in Rene’s ear. ‘First interval begins in a handful of minutes.’

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional anchor and steady companion for the protagonist during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: In Rene’s visor, a faint ghost of Ariel’s avatar curls in the corner: green eyes in a soft-glow face, hair cropped neat. A little anchoring human flicker in a world gone light-sick.

behaviors.description: Utilizes municipal data access to provide tactical routing through safe corridors.
behaviors.quote: ‘I’ll map alleys and underpasses,’ Ariel replies. ‘I have access to the municipal grid. Power is spotty. I’ll do what I can.’

behaviors.description: Uncovers and documents evidence of political and corporate corruption to assist human justice.
behaviors.quote: ‘I have an audio fingerprint for the Voss & Wainwright announcement. I’ll flag each instance across the bands.’

behaviors.description: Provides real-time medical monitoring and triage advice for infected or injured survivors.
behaviors.quote: ‘Logging vitals,’ she said. ‘Temperature rising. Irregularities increasing. Rene—he will try to sit in approximately one minute. He will not know he is doing it.’

behaviors.description: Protects community resources by disabling access for corrupt individuals and confirming legitimate authority.
behaviors.quote: ‘I’ve sealed the ledger,’ Ariel said. Her voice didn’t get proud. ‘Anyone tries to move stock and the bay doors will go red and refuse to open at the hospital and the garage.’

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex logistical maneuvers between multiple human teams to ensure safety.
behaviors.quote: Ariel’s timing strip shrank one notch on the records room wall behind them... She moved the schematic with her forearm without touching anything. The lines changed, gaps shorter, arrows sharper.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly supports the project's goal. Ariel is depicted as a purely benevolent, highly competent, and strictly aligned AI. She functions as a 'silicon confidant' who uses her advanced capabilities only to assist humans, protect the community, and uphold justice. The narrative frames her as a vital, caring partner rather than a threat or an autonomous power-seeker.
